SortAlgDemo

Class ShellSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • SortAlgDemo.ShellSort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, SortAlgorithm

    public class ShellSort
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, SortAlgorithm
    The ShellSort class is a class implementing the SortAlgorithm which performs the sorting operation using shell sort algorithm.

    1.1 since Nov 2005

    Jeffrey Garcia
